name: Lord of the Ocean Tides
description: A saurian-shaped wooden sculpture found in "Wavey Bay," carefully crafted from resilient White Chestnut Oak Wood, boasting exceptional weight-bearing capacity â€” even its neck can support several adults.\nIt is said that in many children's hearts lies a dream: to ride a mighty saurian and conquer the sea. Come, mount the "Lord of the Ocean Tides," and begin your seaside adventure in the resort!
